name: Missing Dad - Team 2
description:
MISSING DAD!

There goes the son, the mother... but where is the father?

Observe the mother and son resemblance and be the fastest to find the one true Father among various shady individuals who all look alike... 

In this game you will face another player who has the same objective, so be the first to find your Father!

The goal is simple : both players face eachother and have the same rules. Your goal is to find your own true Father by observing your mother's appearance. Look for potential hereditary features among the various Father candidates. Some of the fake ones will wander on your screen and your goal is to find the real one by clicking the matching key.

Player 1 key binding : AZEQSD

Player 2 key binding : IOPKLM

Now it's your turn to be the quickest to press the key but... beware of high risk mistakes !

This game was made during a 4 Days Game Jam held by the IIM school. The team involves 9 students from year 2 to year 5.
